Armor_Type.Name: Padded
Armor_Type.Description: Armor covered with a soft material to provide further protection to its wearer and make it more comfortable.

Armor_Type.Name: Leather
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made from the skin of an animal by tanning or a similar process.

Armor_Type.Name: Studded leather
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made of leather that is covered with studs.

Armor_Type.Name: Chain shirt
Armor_Type.Description: A shirt made of flexible, interlinked metal rings.

Armor_Type.Name: Hide
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made of an animal skin treated for human use.

Armor_Type.Name: Scale mail
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made of overlapping metal plates, resembling the scales of a fish.

Armor_Type.Name: Chain Mail
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made of flexible, interlinked metal rings.

Armor_Type.Name: Breastplate
Armor_Type.Description: Armor for the torso that consists of a solid metal plate.

Armor_Type.Name: Splint mail
Armor_Type.Description: Armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding.

Armor_Type.Name: Banded mail
Armor_Type.Description: Armor made up of overlapping strips of metal, fastened to a Leather backing.

Armor_Type.Name: Half-plate
Armor_Type.Description: Armor that consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body.

Armor_Type.Name: Full plate
Armor_Type.Description: Armor that consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body.

Armor_Type.Name: Buckler
Armor_Type.Description: A small, round shield held by a handle or worn on the forearm.

Armor_Type.Name: Shield, light, wooden
Armor_Type.Description: A lightweight shield made of a wooden material.

Armor_Type.Name: Shield, light, steel
Armor_Type.Description: A lightweight shield made of steel.

Armor_Type.Name: Shield, heavy, wooden
Armor_Type.Description: A heavyweight shield made of a wooden material.

Armor_Type.Name: Shield, heavy, steel
Armor_Type.Description: A heavyweight shield made of steel.

Armor_Type.Name: Shield, tower
Armor_Type.Description: A shield designed to cover the entirety of a creature's body.

Armor_Type.Name: Gauntlet
Armor_Type.Description: A thick glove with a long loose wrist.

Armor_Type.Name: Cloth
Armor_Type.Description: Woven or felted fabric made from wool, cotton, or a similar fiber.
